idea:
Learners & Winners Training & Consultancy Private Limited (www.lwtcpl.com) is established as a private limited company under The Companies Act 2013 in the year 2014 and a registered company under The MSME Act, 2006.


Learners & Winners works hand-in-hand with desirably experienced and skilled Management professionals and consultants, providing superior Consultancy, Auditing & Assessment Services for ISO 9001, ISO 14001, ISO 22001, ISO 25001, ISO 27001, ISO 45001 (OHSAS 18001), ISO 50001, HR, Energy, Fire & Safety, Sustainability, Preparation of Disaster Management Plan and Qualitative & Quantitative Risk to organizations of all nature and size across India and abroad, necessary for businesses to understand early warnings, open communication and pragmatic resolution for probable threats in achieving sustainable growth.


We also conduct Executive Development Programs and provide faculties, trainers and/or facilitators for various Technical, Management and Behavioural Training Programs. These programs can be delivered in-house at your premises.
name: LEARNERS & WINNERS TRAINING & CONSULTANCY PRIVATE LIMITED
